body:
Such approach to bug handling is kind of discouraging.
Catch a new repro program:
```go
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"os"
	"runtime"
	"time"
)

var z []byte
var x [][]byte

func main() {
	t0 := time.Now()
	if len(os.Args) > 1 {
		for i := 0; i < 1<<20; i++ {
			x = append(x, make([]byte, 1<<13))
		}
		x = nil
		runtime.GC()
	}
	fmt.Println(time.Since(t0))
	t0 = time.Now()
	for i := 0; i < 1e5; i++ {
		z = make([]byte, 1<<13)
	}
	fmt.Println(time.Since(t0))
}
```
